links.self: /organizations/Code for Philly/projects/Project Research - Documenting Organizations with Technical Needs.json

attributes.description: Every month, dozens of volunteers attend the Code for Philly (CfP) 101 event, bringing with them a diverse set of technical and leadership skills. Similarly, every month, many organizations reach out to CfP about creating projects. However, two big challenges remain.
attributes.name: Project Research - Documenting Organizations with Technical Needs
